Class Corrector

  • java.lang.Object
    • jspell.Corrector

  • public class Corrector
extends Object

      • annotateText

        private void annotateText(File input,
                          File output)
        Anotates a text with the propositions for each unknown word (provided by getNearestSiblings).
        Parameters:
        input - the input text file to anotate
        output - the name of the anotated text file

      • correctLine

        private String correctLine(String displayLine,
                           List<List<String>> errors,
                           Scanner input,
                           List<String> customWords)
        Corrects a line, error by error.
        Parameters:
        displayLine - the formatted line to display
        errors - a list containing for each error the list of propositions
        input - the scanner input to read user's answers
        customWords - the list of the ignored words for this session
        Returns:
        the corrected line
